author: radekkapka
content:
> for block rewards you don’t need to worry because the inclusion rewards for the proposer are computed immediately and applied without any introspection of the total attesting balance

But the response of https://ethereum.github.io/beacon-APIs/?urls.primaryName=dev#/Beacon/getBlockRewards contains an `attestations` field, so we still have to wait

author: sproul
content: I don’t think so? The reward for the block proposer happens inside `process_attestation` which happens during `process_block`. It doesn’t change after the block is applied
